title: 200 Years of Love ~the Noble Lady, Betrayed by the Prince and Banished to the Past~ - Novel Updates
tags: Betrayal   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Nobles   R-15   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Short Story   Time Travel
author: Ajisai   紫陽花
description: The Marquess’s daughter, Lunaria, is falsely accused of attempted assassination of the prince by her fiancée, The country’s First Prince Ares, and is sent deep into the woods two hundred years to the past. She believed in the magician’s words when he said “I will definitely save you”, and She was transmitted to the past, What will happen when she meet Mikhail, the magician, in the world 200 years ago?>
